original: intros a b. induct (equal (Plus (var 1) a) (Plus a (var 1))) 1. - apply eqSym. apply pa3. - apply forallH. apply impH. apply eqTrans with (c := Succ (Plus a (var 0))). ++ apply pa4. ++ apply eqSucc. apply eqTrans with (c := Plus (var 0) a). ** apply eqPlus. --- apply eqRefl. --- apply eqSym. apply pa4. ** apply eqSym. apply pa4.
